items.sentence: I know you wouldn\'t do something like that.
I know you\'re supposed to be working today.
Tom says he has other things to worry about.
Tom seems a little disappointed by the news.
Tell Tom that he needs to apologize to Mary.
Thank you for taking the time to talk to us.
I have to make certain Tom knows what to do.
I\'d like some toast if you are making some.
I want you to listen to what Tom has to say.
I want you to start taking things seriously.
I want you to stay here until Tom gets here.
Tom couldn\'t bribe Mary. However, he tried.
Tom says that he\'s feeling much better now.
I want to leave my farm to my grandchildren.
Why don\'t we all get together next weekend?
I\'m sure Tom won\'t want to sing that song.
I\'m sure Tom wouldn\'t allow me to do that.
Mary is a pretty girl, but has a bad temper.
Tom knew right away something wasn\'t right.
Tom has a good understanding of the problem.
